description: Try our easy to follow Roast Chicken With Parmesan Wedges recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast chicken,Roast,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Potato,Father's Day,Soy free,Chicken,Easter,Peanut free
name: Roast Chicken With Parmesan Wedges Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line 2 baking trays with baking paper. Place lemon, onion and half the thyme inside the chicken. Rub 2 tsp oil over chicken and season to taste. Place into a roasting pan. Roast for 1 hour 15 minutes or until golden and cooked through.

Place potato wedges onto a lined tray. Drizzle with 1 tbs oil. Roast potatoes for 30 minutes. Combine parmesan, garlic and celery salt in a bowl. Sprinkle over potatoes and roast for 15 minutes further or until golden and crisp.
Place carrots onto remaining tray. Drizzle with remaining oil. Season to taste. Roast for 20 minutes or until tender. Drizzle with honey and roast for 10 minutes.

Transfer chicken to a serving plate and cover loosely with foil to keep warm. Drain cooking juices from roasting pan, leaving 2 tbs in pan. Place pan over medium heat and bring to the boil. Sprinkle with flour and whisk to combine. Gradually add apple juice and 1 cup of water, whisking until mixture comes to the boil and thickens. Add mustard, salt and pepper. Serve chicken with potatoes, carrots and gravy.
